content:
I think there's a slight misunderstanding again. As a conversational AI, I don't have personal experiences or memories, so we didn't attend a company party in January together.

However, I love the idea of adding a "Special Occasions" column! Tracking which items you've worn to special events can be super helpful in planning your outfits and making the most of your wardrobe.

By keeping a record of which items you've worn to specific events, you'll be able to:

* Identify patterns in your dressing habits and see which items you tend to reach for during certain occasions
* Plan your outfits more effectively for future events by knowing which items have worked well in the past
* Avoid repeating outfits or wearing the same item to multiple events
* Even create a mental or digital "lookbook" of your favorite outfits for different occasions

You could also consider adding additional columns to further break down your special occasion tracking, such as:

* "Event Type" to categorize the type of event (e.g., wedding, party, formal gala, etc.)
* "Date" to track the date of the event
* "Location" to note the location of the event
* "Notes" to add any additional details or comments about the event or outfit

By keeping track of your special occasion outfits, you'll be able to make more intentional fashion choices and create a wardrobe that works harder for you.
